title: Ding Dong Lyrics Jigarthanda Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ding Dong 
Singers: Arunraja, Moses
Music:  Santhosh Narayanan
Movie: Jigarthanda 

En perai kettu, kaal nadunga
solladha unnai endru, vaai adaikka
enmeedhu kobam ingu por thodukka
en pinne veesa ingum vaal edukka

Ding dong unna katti vachi, udhappen
ding dong unna etti etti, midhippen
ding dong un kai kaala, murippen
ding dong unna savadichi, erippen


Ding dong unna katti vachi, udhappen
ding dong unna etti etti, midhippen
ding dong un kai kaala, murippen
ding dong unna savadichi, erippen


Ding dong unna katti vachi, udhappen
ding dong unna etti etti, midhippen
ding dong un kai kaala, murippen
ding dong unna savadichi, erippen

Villadhi villen endru per eduthu
seiyyaadha paavamellaam serthu vaikka
illadhaa thappu ellaam panni paarthu
oorengum ennai pattri eppozhudhum
pesa vaikka

Ding dong unna katti vachi, udhappen
ding dong unna etti etti, midhippen
ding dong un kai kaala, murippen
ding dong unna savadichi, erippen
